name: KnowledgeoftheDay
0:
”Alexa Knowledge of the Day.”
”Alexa open Knowledge of the Day.”
”Alexa start Knowledge of the Day.”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: knowledge of the day
Developer Terms of Use
des:
This super amazing app is super easy to use to improve your general knowledge. You can ask as many questions as you want. The skill comes with interesting and new questions every time along with proper answers.
Try to learn something, as knowledge increases and wonder deepens. Knowledge is of no value until you put it to use. 

Just say,
Alexa! Knowledge of the Day.
Alexa! Open Knowledge of the Day.
Alexa! Start Knowledge of the Day.
Alexa! Launch Knowledge of the Day.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
